content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]

thought: I need to craft an iron shovel. An iron shovel requires an iron ingot and 2 sticks. I can craft the sticks from the dark_oak_planks in slot 15. To craft the iron ingot, I need to smelt the iron block in slot 25. I will move the iron block to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 24, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: I have smelted the iron ingot and can now craft the sticks. I will move the iron ingot to a free slot (11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
